title: Uncle Si May Have a Freaky Disease from Outer Space
description:
Si experiences a bizarre side effect after handling a meteorite, and so does "Duck Family Treasure" co-star Murry Crowe. Martin is in awe of Murry's invention that almost destroyed the duck-call industry. Phillip is shocked by Murray's ability to land his planes "safely." Si offers advice on how to transition from military to civilian life. And the boys settle a burning question: Sock, sock, shoe, shoe, or sock, shoe, sock, shoe?
